tutorials.title: Lab 1: Account Set Up
tutorials.description: In this Lab you will access to the Microsoft Azure Portal and set up your account.

tutorials.title: Lab 2: Oracle Autonomous Database Provisioning
tutorials.description: In this Lab you will create the Oracle Autonomous Database throught the Azure Portal.

tutorials.title: Lab 3: Oracle Database Actions
tutorials.description: In this Lab you will access to Oracle Database Actions.

tutorials.title: Lab 4: Clean Up
tutorials.description: In this Lab you will have the steps to remove the services that we created for the workshop.

tutorials.title: Need Help?
tutorials.description: Solutions to Common Problems and Directions for Receiving Live Help
